official_title: A bill to provide that the lake referred to as the North Fork Pound River Lake in Wise County, Virginia, shall hereafter be known as Chant B. Kelly Lake.

summary.text: Designates the lake referred to as the North Fork Pound River Lake in Wise County, Virginia, as the Chant B. Kelly Lake.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the lake referred to as the North Fork Pound River Lake in Wise County, Virginia, shall hereafter be known as Chant B. Kelly Lake.
